name: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc.
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. is a leading American multinational mass media and entertainment conglomerate formed in 2022 from the merger of WarnerMedia and Discovery, Inc. The company operates globally across television, film, and streaming, with major brands including Warner Bros. Pictures, HBO, CNN, Discovery Channel, and DC Entertainment. Headquartered in New York City, WBD is publicly traded and serves as one of the largest content producers and distributors in the world.
